entry.title: Re 13/16 Pump and Dump A scheme where people will hype a project with no fundamentals in order to make the price of the #token increase to then sell t...
entry.summary: Re 13/16 Pump and Dump A scheme where people will hype a project with no fundamentals in order to make the price of the #token increase to then sell their holdings to earn profit

entry.title: Re 11/16 HODL Originated in 2013 after a post on the #Bitcoin forum by a user who posted “I AM HODLING” with a typo, it is used to refer to when som...
entry.summary: Re 11/16 HODL Originated in 2013 after a post on the #Bitcoin forum by a user who posted “I AM HODLING” with a typo, it is used to refer to when someone is holding on to their tokens instead of selling them

entry.title: Re 8/16 Gas & Gwei ⛽ Gas is the fee required to complete a transaction on the #ETH blockchain Gwei is the denomination of $ETH that the gas price is ...
entry.summary: Re 8/16 Gas & Gwei ⛽ Gas is the fee required to complete a transaction on the #ETH blockchain Gwei is the denomination of $ETH that the gas price is paid in (1 Gwei = 0.000000001 ETH)
